::Zardus::

Zardus nods. "Yes. Excelent...."

He looks around again, admiring the technology of the ship. This would be an 
excelent ship to be in alliance with...

He looks down at his scanner, nearly jumping as he sees that the Alliance 
base is under attack .... by Maximals!

"Delta, let's go!" he starts to walk toward the exit, but turns to look at 
Panzertron. "I have to take care of this for now. We can meet later if you 
wish."

With that, Zardus walks out, heading for the exit.
